pr_title: FM2-178: Add patient search parameter where subject is allowed

timeline.bodyText:
@reagan-meant I don't think that we should do this here.
cc @ibacher
timeline.author: VaishSiddharth

replies.bodyText: Actually, this is explicitly what we do want to have happen. The patient search parameter is a sub-set of the subject search parameter where the subject is a Patient. So the patient parameter is more exact than the subject parameter. I suppose the other thing we could do is throw an exception here.
replies.author: ibacher

replies.bodyText: @ibacher what would be the potential cause the exception?
replies.author: reagan-meant
